DOC.brief_title: The Effects Behavioral Activation Physical Exercise Depression
DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : Despite potential low-threshold , low-cost high-flexibility treatment depression , behavioural activation physical exercise yet directly compare . This study examine effect intervention , administer via Internet . The added effect provide treatment rationale also study , well relapse prevention program feature cognitive behavioural therapy component . METHODS/DESIGN : This randomise controlled trial include 500 participant meet diagnostic criterion major depression , recruit multiple cycle randomise either wait list control group delay treatment , one four treatment group : ( 1 ) physical exercise without clear treatment rationale ; ( 2 ) physical exercise treatment rationale ; ( 3 ) behavioural activation treatment rationale ; ( 4 ) behavioural activation without clear treatment rationale . Post treatment , half participant offer relapse prevention program . Primary outcome measure Patient Health Questionnaire 9-item . Secondary measure include diagnostic criterion depression , well self-reported anxiety , physical activity quality life . Measurements - do via telephone Internet - collect pre-treatment , weekly treatment period , immediately post treatment monthly 24-month follow-up period . DISCUSSION : The result study constitute important contribution body knowledge respective intervention .
